room_title: Escape room "The Box" by Time Trap in Tampa
room_address: 8042 Old County Rd 54 New Port Richey, FL 34653
room_description:
There are no actual clowns and all content is appropriate for participants at all ages. The room is dark, however. We imagined how a modern-day sadistic killer would actually design a room where you had to outsmart the killer or die trying.
While simple in design, the game is dark and difficult. The killer wouldnâ€™t give you a fancy television with a nice count-down clock and already thought through clues. It features a straightforward build out with nothing to take away from the puzzles. When you walk into this room, you are not given directions (at the hardest setting) or a storyline. You have one source of light and the BOX is staring at you daring you to fail.
